summary: This is an email chain regarding a victim meeting in New York on October 23, 2019. A partner at a law firm is coordinating travel for a client (an Epstein victim) to attend the meeting, copying the client on the email. The email includes standard confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: Partner
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is coordinating travel for their client (an Epstein victim) to attend a meeting in New York. They copy their client on the email.

connections.description: The Partner is arranging travel for their client, an Epstein victim, to attend a meeting in New York.

events.title: Epstein Victim Meeting in New York
events.description: A meeting for Epstein victims is scheduled to take place in New York.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim meeting was scheduled for October 23, 2019, in New York.
A law firm partner was coordinating travel arrangements for a client (an Epstein victim) to attend this meeting.
The email communication is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege.
The victim's identity is not disclosed in the text; they are referred to only as the 'client'.
